Question 140) A 6,000 L cistern was emptied in a period of 3 h. In the first hour only one bomb was used, but within the next two hours, the end of reducing the emptying time, another pump was turned on with the first. The graph, formed by two line segments, shows the volume of water present in the cistern, as a function of time.
3 6 000 5 000 1 0 TIME (H) Volume (L) What is the flow, in liter per hour, of the pump that was connected at the beginning of the second hour?
A) 1 000
B) 1 250
C) 1 500
D) 2 000
E) 2 500
